title: Annex III — High‑risk areas (employment)
excerpt: AI systems intended to be used for recruitment or selection of natural persons, notably to place targeted job advertisements, to analyse and filter job applications, and to evaluate candidates in the course of interviews or tests...

title: Article 9 — Risk management system
excerpt: High‑risk AI systems shall be developed within a continuous iterative process, run throughout the entire lifecycle, of systematic identification, analysis, estimation and evaluation of risks...

title: Article 10 — Data and data governance
excerpt: Training, validation and testing data sets shall be subject to appropriate data governance and management practices...

title: Article 13 — Transparency and user information
excerpt: High‑risk AI systems shall be accompanied by instructions for use with concise, complete and clear information...

title: Article 14 — Human oversight
excerpt: High‑risk AI systems shall be designed and developed in such a way that they can be effectively overseen by natural persons...

title: Article 15 — Accuracy, robustness and cybersecurity
excerpt: High‑risk AI systems shall achieve appropriate levels of accuracy, robustness and cybersecurity...

title: Annex IV — Technical documentation
excerpt: The technical documentation shall be drawn up before the AI system is placed on the market, and shall demonstrate compliance with the requirements...

title: Post‑market monitoring & reporting
excerpt: Providers shall establish and document a post‑market monitoring system and obligations to report serious incidents...
